definition: Bazhong prefecture-level city in Panzhihua 攀枝花[Pan1 zhi1 hua1], south Sichuan
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

Bazhong prefecture-level city in Panzhihua 攀枝花[Pan1 zhi1 hua1], south Sichuan

sentences.english: Zardari said the two countries are all-weather close friends.
sentences.chinese: 扎爾達里表示，巴中是全天候的親密朋友。

sentences.english: Brazil wishes to continuously expand and deepen bilateral strategic partnership.
sentences.chinese: 巴西希望不斷擴大和深化巴中戰略伙伴關係。

sentences.english: He said the two countries were partners that could trust each other forever.
sentences.chinese: 他表示，巴中兩國是永遠可以相互信賴的夥伴。

sentences.english: Shen Hongmei is from Bazhong, Sichuan province.
sentences.chinese: 沈紅梅，來自四川巴中地區。

sentences.english: The relationship is indeed a geopolitical keystone for both countries.
sentences.chinese: 巴中關係確實是這兩個國家的地緣政治基石。

sentences.english: This is part of the Pakistan-China Economic Corridor.
sentences.chinese: 這是巴中經濟走廊的一部分。

sentences.english: Both sides also talked about further expanding Pakistan-China economic and trade cooperation and specific projects concerned.
sentences.chinese: 雙方還談及進一步擴大巴中經貿合作和有關具體項目。

sentences.english: The Pakistan-China friendship over the past six decades has been a win-win partnership.
sentences.chinese: 過去六十年，巴中友誼一直是一種雙贏的夥伴關係。

sentences.english: It said that "the Pakistan-China relationship is much more than a strategic influence of interests between two countries".
sentences.chinese: 這句話是這樣說的，“巴中不僅僅是利益之交”。

sentences.english: He sent a messenger to Bazhong to call on Lu to surrender.
sentences.chinese: 遂差人往巴中，勸使投降。

sentences.english: Musharraf said that both countries share very sound relations.
sentences.chinese: 穆沙拉夫說，巴中兩國之間有着非常良好的關係。
